languages.text: Тяжело раненый, Ульфар был возвращен на борт корабля. Вопреки ожиданиям целителей он не скончался от полученных травм, и, вероятно, сможет объяснить Лорд-капитану причины своего побега.

Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.
languages.original_text: Тяжело раненый, Ульфар был возвращен на борт корабля. Вопреки ожиданиям целителей он не скончался от полученных травм, и, вероятно, сможет объяснить Лорд-капитану причины своего побега.

traits.locale_text: Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

languages.text: Gravement blessé, Ulfar a été ramené à bord du vaisseau. En dépit du pronostic des chirurgeons, il n'a pas succombé à ses blessures. Il est peut-être même prêt à expliquer les raisons de sa disparition {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Gravement blessé, Ulfar a été ramené à bord du vaisseau. En dépit du pronostic des chirurgeons, il n'a pas succombé à ses blessures. Il est peut-être même prêt à expliquer les raisons de sa disparition {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: 身受重伤的乌尔法被送回了船上。尽管船医已经不抱希望，但乌尔法最终还是撑了下来。此刻，他打算向行商浪人解释他私自离开的原因。
languages.original_text: Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 身受重伤的乌尔法被送回了船上。尽管船医已经不抱希望，但乌尔法最终还是撑了下来。此刻，他打算向行商浪人解释他私自离开的原因。

languages.text: 重傷を負ったウルファーは船に運ばれた。チラ－ジョンの予想に反して、彼は怪我による死亡を免れた。逃亡を図ろうとした理由をロード・キャプテンに説明する準備が整っていればいいのだが。
languages.original_text: Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 重傷を負ったウルファーは船に運ばれた。チラ－ジョンの予想に反して、彼は怪我による死亡を免れた。逃亡を図ろうとした理由をロード・キャプテンに説明する準備が整っていればいいのだが。

languages.text: Ulfar wurde schwer verwundet zurück auf das Schiff gebracht. Trotz der düsteren Prognosen des Chirurgeums ist er seinen Verletzungen nicht erlegen. Hoffentlich erklärt er dem Lord Captain nun, warum er heimlich verschwunden ist.
languages.original_text: Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar wurde schwer verwundet zurück auf das Schiff gebracht. Trotz der düsteren Prognosen des Chirurgeums ist er seinen Verletzungen nicht erlegen. Hoffentlich erklärt er dem Lord Captain nun, warum er heimlich verschwunden ist.

languages.text: Ulfar, gravemente herido, fue transportado a la nave. A pesar de las expectativas de los cirujanos, sobrevivió a sus heridas. Esperemos que ahora esté dispuesto a explicar su huida a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar, gravemente herido, fue transportado a la nave. A pesar de las expectativas de los cirujanos, sobrevivió a sus heridas. Esperemos que ahora esté dispuesto a explicar su huida a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: Ağır yaralanan Ulfar, gemiye geri götürüldü. Cerrahın beklentilerinin aksine aldığı yaralar, vefatına sebep olmadı. Artık Lord Kaptan'dan kaçınmasının nedenlerini açıklamaya hazır olmalı.
languages.original_text: Gravely wounded, Ulfar was transported back to the ship. Despite the chirurgeons' expectations, he did not perish from his injuries and is hopefully now ready to explain the reasons for his abscondment to the Lord Captain.
